# believe_coaching_principles (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "believe_coaching_principles" "example_coaching_principles" {

}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `max_items` (Number) Max items to fetch, default: 1000

### Read-Only

- `items` (Attributes List) The items returned by the data source (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `application` (String) How to apply this principle
- `example_from_show` (String) Example from the show
- `explanation` (String) What this principle means
- `id` (String) Principle identifier
- `principle` (String) The coaching principle
- `ted_quote` (String) Related Ted quote
